page.title: 06CUSTOMS: BAND PARADES
page.content:
BAND PARADES
THE DIFFERENT BAND PARADES ARE THE MINI 12th, 12th OF JULY, BLACK SATURDAY AND THE HOSPITAL PARADE FOR CASTLEDERG. THE MINI 12th IN KILLEN IS CELEBRATED BY MANY PEOPLE AND BANDS. ICE-CREAM MEN AND CHIP VANS ARE AT EVERY PARADE. THE 12th OF JULY IS THE MOST IMPORTANT DATE ON THE CALENDAR FOR ORANGEMEN. THE 12th IS A LARGE BAND PARADE WHICH IS HELD IN DIFFERENT PLACES EVERY YEAR, THIS YEAR IT IS IN DROMORE. ABOUT FORTY BANDS COME TO THIS OCCASION AND PARADE THE TOWN. A PIPE BAND COMES FROM KILLEN AND THERE IS A FLUTE BAND FROM CASTLEDERG. SOME PEOPLE TRAVEL TO THIS EVENT BY BUS ALONG WITH THE BAND MEMBERS AND ENJOY A FUN PACKED DAY.
